node.title: 'Worst few moments of my life': Community mourns children who fell from flyaway jumping castle
node.alt: A teddy bear and flowers left at the Hillcrest Primary School.
node.description: A small northern Tasmanian community has been left "heartbroken" after five children die when a jumping castle takes off in a gust of wind at an end-of-year primary school event.
node.content:
["A small\u00a0northern Tasmanian community has been left \"heartbroken\" after five children\u00a0died when a jumping castle takes\u00a0off\u00a0in a gust of wind at an end-of-year primary school event.", "WARNING: This story contains details of the incident and photographs that some readers may find distressing.", "Four\u00a0other year\u00a05 and 6\u00a0Hillcrest Primary School students are in hospital.\u00a0", "According to eyewitness reports to police, a gust of wind picked up the jumping castle and threw it into the air, pulling the kids with it.", "The children\u00a0fell from a height of about 10 metres, landing on the school's sports oval and off the hilly slope at the edge of the oval.", "Several zorb balls \u2014 large, inflated\u00a0balls with\u00a0children standing inside \u2014 also took off with the wind.", "", "
Police are investigating and gathering evidence, which may take \"quite some time\".(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "One parent, whose child was at yesterday's event,\u00a0said the tragedy at the\u00a0\"friendly little school\" in Devonport\u00a0had affected everyone \"deeply\".", "\"I had the worst few moments of my life while driving to school, not knowing if my child was OK,\" she said.", "\"My thoughts are with the parents, families, friends, teachers and the emergency services that attended to the children involved in [the] tragedy.\"", "The parent, who did not want to be named, told the ABC the whole school had been invited to the \"Big Day In\"\u00a0event that involved \"dancing, games, slippery slide, bouncy castle\".", "She said a similar event had been held last year. And, because it had been a success, it was repeated\u00a0this year, instead of the\u00a0usual picnic at the bluff.", "", "
The jumping castle pulled the kids with it, when it took off, according to witnesses.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "", "
According to eyewitness reports to police, a gust of wind picked up the jumping castle and threw it into the air.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "Andrew, who works at the nearby Devonport Community House, said he was on his way to pick up the keys to the local park \u2014\u00a0to set up a community Christmas event there \u2014 when he was \"confronted with the terrible scene\" that had had happened \"minutes\" before.", "\"My heart and thoughts are with all those who are affected by this terrible incident.\"", "", "
Robert, who lives up the road from the Hillcrest Primary School, says he's \"pretty devastated\".(ABC News: April McLennan)
", "Kate Beer, who manages the community centre, said the snags meant for the Christmas in the Park event would be cooked for meals for distressed community members.", "\"We have a food shed we'll open, and people have just really wanted to talk and try [to]\u00a0understand a bit of what's happened and make some sense of it,\" she said.", "\"It's shock and just horror for the families involved in our local community.", "\"You just think what a horrific situation for people to have to face.\"", "Robert, who lives up the road from the school said he saw the aftermath of the tragedy.", "\"[I'm] pretty devastated. It hits home pretty well,\" he said.", "
'One of the toughest times we've faced', mayor says
", "Devonport mayor Annette Rockliff said the whole town struggled to comprehend the disaster.", "\"We'll all know someone who's been affected by this,\" she said.", "\"It's going to be one of the toughest times we've faced. There's no getting around that.\"", "She asked that people\u00a0extend\u00a0their care to the first responders \u2014 for some of whom it had been their first day at work.", "\"That must be a terrible thing for them to have to deal with.", "", "
Mayor\u00a0Annette Rockliff says police and emergency services have done an \"amazing\" job.(ABC News: Monte Bovill)
", "\"Please, if you know an ambo or a police officer, make sure that you can stay in touch with them. That they understand that we appreciate the amazing work they've done.\"", "The coroner yesterday visited the scene and police are investigating and gathering evidence, but Tasmania Police Commissioner Darren Hine said the investigation would take \"quite some time\"."]
